str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From paideuo; tutorage, i.e. Education or training; by implication, disciplinary correction.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Feminine Singular

str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A sharer, partner, associate. From metecho; participant, i.e. a sharer; by implication, an associate.
Then, therefore, since. Probably from airo; a particle denoting an inference more or less decisive.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Illegitimate, base-born. Of uncertain affinity; a spurious or illegitimate son.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
